ExCnt.EX: A curious technique used by the Persian magi is worth recounting .
Thus they may be said to be a link between the shaman and the magus of medieval times .
Most depictions of the card shows the Magus having mastery over the four elements , which is an attribute of Spirit .
Indeed , when these skilled practitioners in magic are mentioned in early texts in Latin of an Irish provenance , they are referred to as magi.

FwkSenCnt.MEANING: one of the three wise men in the New Testament

ExCnt.EX: It lies behind the story we read in Matthew about the magi coming from the east with their gifts .
The same argument could be applied to an object moving with the stars , however , if the journey of the magi took some months .

FwkSenCnt.MEANING: master or expert in a given field

ExCnt.EX: Finnish multi-instrumentalist and all-round musical magus Marko Nyberg leads the charge .
Scientists have been increasingly professionalised within universities , research institutes and industrial enterprises , the magi have been replaced by managers of research .
